entry.overview: Make module compatible with Magento >= 2.4.4. Fix user joureny bugs
entry.description: Fix closings of html tags. Do not display undefined when carrier_title or method_title are not set in admin panel. Prevent possibility of going to the payment step without shipping address: - when a user choose packstation - store previous shipping adress - select this address when a user check again a standard shipping method

entry.overview: Switch from translation alias to original method
entry.description: Translation alias has not been defined therfore translation should be done with reference to original method.
